addProductIdsToOrder.title: addProductIdsToOrder
addProductIdsToOrder.description: Optional: A String[] list of 18 character alphanumeric Salesforce Product2 Ids to add to the Order as line items. Ask the user to select the products to add from the product2 records.

orderId.title: orderId
orderId.description: The orderId of the Order with OrderItems to update. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.

removeProductIdsFromOrder.title: removeProductIdsFromOrder
removeProductIdsFromOrder.description: Optional: A String[] list of 18 character alphanumeric Salesforce Product2 Ids to remove from this order. Ask the user to select the products from the existing orderItems to remove.
